name: My Botanical Romance
description:
Before the great confinement, you decided to buy plants. After a while, your plants came to life! Who will you keep alive?

Interact with Sunflower, Weed, Carnivorous, Cactus and Fern! New lively plants in your apartment. Go on date with them. Only one of them will stay alive!

This game was done during Ludum Dare 46 Game Jam. The theme was Keep it Alive

The game might receive further development for fine tuning.

Credits:

Jessy Anglehart-Nunes (Mélo) - Programming, Dialogue Text, UI Design, animation

Francis Labelle (Shill) - Programming, Sound Design, UI Design

Audrey Lemay (Mayo) - Character Design, Asset Design, UI Design, Animation
